name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra features a 6.8 inch AMOLED display, 12GB of RAM, 256GB of storage, and a 5000mAh battery

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
description: The Google Pixel 6 Pro features a 6.7 inch OLED display, 12GB of RAM, up to 512GB of storage, and a 5000mAh battery. It also has a dual camera setup with a 50MP primary sensor and support for 5G connectivity.

name: Sony WH-1000XM4
description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 are noise-cancelling headphones that deliver exceptional sound quality and comfort.

name: iPad Pro
description: The latest iPad Pro with 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, Apple M1 chip, and 5G capability.
